Method Detail

release

public void release()
Description copied from interface: Arc
Unplugs this arc from corresponding Place and Transition.

guard

public boolean guard()
Checks if this arc is enabled.

Returns:
this call evaluates the guard, and returns true if the arc is enabled, false otherwise.

expression

public void expression()
Evaluates this arc expression. The actual result of this expression evaluation is accessible from the context. The arc expression is evaluated many times during net simulation, thus should not have any side effects, apart from selecting tokens via Context methods.

setGuard

public void setGuard(InputArc.Guard aGuard)
